name: Lingo Bingo

challenges: Some of the challenges faced include making the json data and in case of speaking the word.
improvements: In the future, I plan to implement a more efficient and unique design also i want to add more vocabularies.

name: Visa Portal
description: A comprehensive web application for searching, booking, and managing hotel reservations with real-time availability and pricing.
challenges: Some challenges faced include my visa application section.
improvements: I plan to add a more robust notification system and enhance the scalability of the backend. I want to add google map too.

name: Hotel Booking
description: A simple task management web application with user authentication and task categorization.
challenges: I faced difficulties with task categorization and loading the logged in user details in review section .
improvements: I plan to integrate a more powerful database, work on the mobile responsiveness, and more unique design for the web page .

name: Tourism Management System
description: Tourism Management System is a full-stack app built with React, Express, and MongoDB that enables users to explore and book tours in Bangladesh. It features role-based access, secure authentication, and a responsive design for a seamless travel experience.
challenges: I faced difficulties with task categorization and loading the logged in user details in review section .
improvements: I plan to integrate a more powerful database, establish the payment method on different platform like Bkash, Nogod etc, and wanted to establish hotel booking as well as visa system.
